greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: 1/(Sum_{k>=0} (k!)^2 x^k).
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
Marcelo Aguiar and Swapneel Mahajan, On The Hadamard product Of Hopf monoids
John D. Dixon, Asymptotics of Generating the Symmetric and Alternating Groups, Electronic Journal of Combinatorics, 2005, vol 11(2), R56.
formula: G.f.: 2/Q(0), where Q(k) = 1 + 1/(1 - (k+1)^2*x/((k+1)^2*x + 1/Q(k+1) )); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Sep 17 2013
mathematica: nn = 20; CoefficientList[Series[1/Sum[(k!)^2 x^k, {k, 0, nn}], {x, 0, nn}], x] (* _T. D. Noe_, Jan 03 2013 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 26 2006
